author: ZeroWP Team
description: Provides an easy interface to assign colors to any term from any taxonomy
long_description: Provides an easy interface to assign colors to any term from any taxonomy. Then you can use them on front-end using the built-in CSS class or just by calling `get_term_meta`.
faq:
= Do I have to place some code in my theme? =
No. You can use the plugin as it is, just to differentiate terms by color. However, if you want to display the colors on the front-end, you may need to use the CSS class, that is something like `.ztc-term-label-{ID}`, or directly `get_term_meta` to retrieve the meta value.
